segments.text: I look at the scene and see the sink area first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows steadily from the faucet into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over the edge, creating a puddle on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, towel in hand, polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She wears a dress and apron, looking quite domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, cabinets are open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy climbs the stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, arm extended toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden appears well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, allowing natural light in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between inside and outside is interesting.
segments.speaker: PAR
